name: Pillar of Agony
description: Hades calls to all enemy souls nearby, pulling them closer to him over time, doing damage every .5s for 4s. If the enemy is Blighted, their Protections are reduced. Hades also gains Protections and 10% damage mitigation for the duration.
stats: Damage per Tick: 45/60/75/90/105 (+30% of your magical power)
